inclusion.criterion: FEV1 < 65% of predicted and FEV1 to FVC ratio < 70%
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Baseline PAO2 while stable between 60-75 mmHg
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: The ability to provide informed consent
inclusion.label: met

exclusion.criterion: Clinical instability as evidenced by an acute exacerbation requiring an intensification of therapy and/or the need for hospitalization with the preceding 3 months.
exclusion.label: not_met

exclusion.criterion: Presence of an additional cause of lung disease as suggested by history, clinical or radiographic findings, or pulmonary function tests
exclusion.label: unknown

notes: Patient has multifactorial chronic hypoxemia and dyspnea thought due to diastolic CHF, pulmonary hypertension thought secondary to a chronic ASD and COPD on 5L home oxygen. Cardiology consult recommended a right heart cath for evaluation of response to sildenafil but the patient refused.
